# mkad-coords
https://www.keene.edu/campus/maps/tool/
```php
<?php

$coords = [
[37.842000, 55.774000],

[37.712000, 55.889000],
[37.723000, 55.883000],
[37.735000, 55.877000],
[37.741000, 55.874000],
[37.764000, 55.862000],
[37.765000, 55.861000],
[37.788000, 55.850000],
[37.788000, 55.850000],
[37.800000, 55.844000],
[37.822000, 55.832000],
[37.829000, 55.828000],
[37.837000, 55.821000],
[37.838000, 55.811000],
[37.840000, 55.802000],
[37.840000, 55.793000],
[37.841000, 55.785000],
[37.842000, 55.774000],

];


foreach($coords as $key =>  $coord) {
    $xz = 37.6236248;
    $yz = 55.7520909;
    
    $x1 = $coord[0];
    $y1 = $coord[1];
    $d = -0.07; 
    $a = atan2($yz - $y1, $xz - $x1);


    $x2 = $x1 + $d*cos($a);
    $y2 = $y1 + $d*sin($a);

    echo "{$x2}, {$y2}\n";
}

echo "\n";
echo "\n";
echo "\n";
echo "\n";

foreach(array_reverse($coords) as $key =>  $coord) {
    $xz = 37.6236248;
    $yz = 55.7520909;
    
    $x1 = $coord[0];
    $y1 = $coord[1];
    $d = 0.07; 
    $a = atan2($yz - $y1, $xz - $x1);


    $x2 = $x1 + $d*cos($a);
    $y2 = $y1 + $d*sin($a);

    echo "{$x2}, {$y2}\n";
}
```
